stations.name: Tempest Weatherflow System
stations.description: Centered around the Tempest Weather Station and the powerful Tempest app with a guaranteed better forecast, the Tempest Weather System is the ultimate tool for managing your smart home, garden, and all weather-driven decisions.

stations.name: Ambient Weather WS-2902
stations.description: Ambient Weather's best-selling Personal Wi-Fi Weather Station, the WS-2902, allows you to monitor your home and backyard weather conditions with a brilliant, easy-to-read LCD color display.

stations.name: La Crosse Technology C85845-INT
stations.description: Full color display gives you current temperatures & humidity, with a future forecast whether it could be sunny or rainy to snowy. Features accurate, self-set atomic time & date with automatic DST updates. Records min/max values and alerts you of extreme temperatures.
